lines.text: Maybe you're suppose to say some words or something. Huh? What words?
Nothing to say to your sweet old dad?

Astrious Mundabar Desmagon... I envoke your powers. Come Heed my bidding on this night of nights. The eve of somehain, all Hallows Eve. Spirits of darkness, I command you to rise from your graves. EtLavamous Sagamaine, All manner of demons. I emplore your release from Eternal torment. Testegas Sogamaine. All man are of dead, renewed by sleep. Thirsting for blood, this night and forever, he who is touched by evil, shall become evil. Sodamous sogamaine. He who has died, shall rise again, bestamous sogamhaine. Life to the dead, Death to the living. Demons arise, arise, arise.
So what do you think? Red... or white?
Captain Jensen, three reports. Don't you think that adds up to something?
Sure I do. Warewolves, zombies, vampires and little green men add up to... lets all have fun with the cops. I got your report. Happy Halloween.

Yea it's the Wolfman and its Halloween, so we goin' be rocking to the midnight hour with the weird tunes! The straight down baby, for all you young lovers. So guys, grab your favorite ghoul and hold her real tight, give her a love bite, because tonight just might be the night.
